DefaultMessage.description: The default message shown in the browserAction popup
DefaultMessage.message: CurlWget needs first the download window to be initiated (i.e.:download something first)

contextHelpMessage.description: The default message shown in the browserAction popup
contextHelpMessage.message: Click this text to select then copy and paste it into the commandline window. (If command line is Microsoft Windows cmd.exe then replace all apostrophes with double quotes!)

extensionDescription.message: Builds a command line for 'curl/wget' tools to enable the download of data on a console only session.
